room_title: Escape room "The Eccentric Millionaire" by The Room - Wichita in Wichita
room_description:
If you haven’t already heard, Mr. Cowl Von Smith has passed away. Mr. Smith was one of America’s most eccentric millionaires and loved puzzles and challenges. In meeting with his final wishes, you have been given the opportunity to take his inheritance.
Inside the safe is the deed to all Mr. Smith’s fortune. You have one hour to retrieve the envelope and leave the room before Mr. Smith’s relatives arrive with the police for the contents of the safe.
